title: Design and experimental study of a precision fluid hill-drop planter for maize
description: The study presents the design of a precision maize hill-drop dibbler based on fluid control and zero-speed seeding theory, developed to overcome challenges of poor planting precision, seed damage, limited terrain adaptability, and low water-use efficiency in …
